Do you feel economy slowdown & decreasing customers demand?

The bad news? This chaos is global, persistent, and only just beginning.

Because the real trouble lies in the bedrock of the world economy: the USA.

The root cause is exponentially increasing USD supply & US government debt. They inherently embedded on how USD is originated since the 70's. Unless it changes, the time bomb will keep ticking, and will explode around 2030's.

We need a new global money, way before 2040. But other countries' money shared the exact same issue with USD (e.g. CNY, IDR), while gold & silver are no longer practical to replace USD as the world money.

The economic collapse isn't coming—it's already happening, and it's only getting worse. Most of your wealth—your years of hard work—is evaporating at accelerating rate. The question is: When everyone is in panic, can your company and your family survive?

When the US itself -- as the source of this chaos -- is now climbing the ladder of solution a smart leader understands that bitcoin is going to be popular.

Why it does perform so well?

Because bitcoin is simply the opposite of dollars: It's limited in supply, with immutable monetary policy, originated from energy competition instead of debt. The problems of dollars give bitcoin value.

If it has 16 years of success, why it’s not yet popular now?

Because bitcoin is not easy to grasp.
Few people have truly experienced the unstoppable nature of network-based technologies—like Torrent.
Bitcoin is also the first thing on Earth with a supply that is guaranteed never to increase, no matter how high the demand—unlike gold and other cryptocurrencies.

We’re born into a world where we assume only governments can issue money, even though 5,000 years of human history say otherwise.
